title: Updated Android 10 Pixel 2XL. After downloading, installing,restarting, phone stuck on launch screen
content: I attempted to update my Google Pixel 2XL to Andriod 10 today. I successfully downloaded and installed the update. However, after restarting my device, it has stayed on the Google Launch Screen for over 30 minutes. I have tried to restart the device and it stays on the launch screen.
